title: Part a. [0–2]
stimulusHtml:
2 points

1 point: For a correct expression of the relationship among T, R, and v
T= 2πR v R= vT 2π R= ( 3.40× 10 3 m/s )( 7.08× 10 3 s ) 2π MathType@MTEF@5@5@@5C53@

1 point: For the correct numerical answer
R = 3.83 x 106 m

title: Part b. [0–2]

title: Part c. [0–4]
stimulusHtml:
4 points

1 point: For a correct expression that equates Etot to the sum of kinetic and gravitational potential energies
Etot = K + U

1 point: For a negative sign on a correct expression for UG
E tot = 1 2 m s v 2 − G m s M m R MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9 vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=x fr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaGaamyramaaBa aaleaacaWG0bGaam4BaiaadshaaeqaaOGaeyypa0ZaaSaaaeaacaaI XaaabaGaaGOmaaaacaWGTbWaaSbaaSqaaiaadohaaeqaaOGaamODam aaCaaaleqabaGaaGOmaaaakiabgkHiTmaalaaabaGaam4raiaad2ga daWgaaWcbaGaam4CaaqabaGccaWGnbWaaSbaaSqaaiaad2gaaeqaaa GcbaGaamOuaaaaaaa@4731@

1 point: For explicit substitution of the value of R from a. and the value of MM from b. in the equation above or for correct numerical answer if worked as follows:
From( b ), M m = v 2 R G E tot = 1 2 m s v 2 − G m s R v 2 R G = 1 2 m s v 2 − m s v 2 =− 1 2 m s v 2 E tot =− 1 2 ( 930kg ) ( 3.40× 10 3 m/s ) 2 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@82DA@

1 point: For a negative sign on the final answer
Etot = –5.38 x 109 J

title: Part d. [0–3]
stimulusHtml:
3 points

1 point: For correct selection of “Less than” check space

2 points: For a correct justification
Example 1: From Kepler's third law (r3 / T2 = constant), if r decreases, then T must also decrease

Example 2: Use relationships among R, v, and T with no incorrect physics such as the following: From b., M m = v 2 R G MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9 vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=x fr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaGaamytamaaBa aaleaacaWGTbaabeaakiabg2da9maalaaabaGaamODamaaCaaaleqa baGaaGOmaaaakiaadkfaaeaacaWGhbaaaaaa@3C97@ so as R decreases, v must increase. From a., T= 2πR v MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9 vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=x fr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaGaamivaiabg2 da9maalaaabaGaaGOmaiabec8aWjaadkfaaeaacaWG2baaaaaa@3C30@ so both a decrease in R and an increase in v contribute to a decrease in T.

Note: 1 point partial credit was awarded for using only T= 2πR v MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9 vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=x fr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaGaamivaiabg2 da9maalaaabaGaaGOmaiabec8aWjaadkfaaeaacaWG2baaaaaa@3C30@ , unless it was stated that v was constant, in which case no credit was awarded.

Note: 1 point partial credit was awarded for using only T= 2πR v MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9 vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=x fr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaGaamivaiabg2 da9maalaaabaGaaGOmaiabec8aWjaadkfaaeaacaWG2baaaaaa@3C30@ , unless it was stated that v was constant, in which case no credit was awarded.

title: Part e. [0–2]
stimulusHtml:
2 points

1 point: For a correct expression of conservation of angular momentum
msv1r1 = m2v2r2 or equivalent such as I 1 ω 1 = I 2 ω 2 ,or, v 1 r 1 = v 2 r 2 MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9 vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=x fr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaGaamysamaaBa aaleaacaaIXaaabeaakiabeM8a3naaBaaaleaacaaIXaaabeaakiab g2da9iaadMeadaWgaaWcbaGaaGOmaaqabaGccqaHjpWDdaWgaaWcba GaaGOmaaqabaGccaGGSaGaam4BaiaadkhacaGGSaGaamODamaaBaaa leaacaaIXaaabeaakiaadkhadaWgaaWcbaGaaGymaaqabaGccqGH9a qpcaWG2bWaaSbaaSqaaiaaikdaaeqaaOGaamOCamaaBaaaleaacaaI Yaaabeaaaaa@4BE9@
